short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize which GitHub Event to be notified.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
> Too many unwanted GitHub issue or PR notifications? Want more precise notifications? This web extension allows you to customize which GitHub Event to be notified.

Use cases:
- Get notified on specific labels: "good first issues", "help-wanted", "bug", "feature-xyz", etc.
- Get notified when someone mentions "@username" in the issue or PR, not just yourself.
- Get notified only when comment matched specific keywords, even from the ones you are not participating.
- and more...

This is an open source project: github-custom-notifier, you can find it on GitHub and fire some issues if you meet any bugs or have any feature requests!
